solution_line_template: The following week, he sold {salmon_sold_this_week} x {multiplier_next_week} = <<{salmon_sold_this_week}*{multiplier_next_week}={salmon_sold_next_week}>>{salmon_sold_next_week} kg of salmon.
So he sold {salmon_sold_this_week} + {salmon_sold_next_week} = <<{salmon_sold_this_week}+{salmon_sold_next_week}={total_fish_sold}>>{total_fish_sold} kg of fish.
